articles.author: Will
articles.blogName: NickMercs talking about the Kilo coming back to COD
articles.blogContent: Nick has a valid point. I'm happy they bought back the kilo. always one of my favorites from COD.

articles.author: Tony
articles.blogContent: does flight ever win?? I mean this game is so rigged. Right when you feel like you're in the lead they change the odds against you.

articles.author: Danny
articles.blogContent: I agree that stuns suck, why use them if i can't get get any kills with them? I just dont get it. Sure they help but they're not really something i'm dying for.

articles.author: Tom
articles.blogContent: this guy is always going nuts, watching him freak out is hilarious. So relateable

articleComments.name: Danny
articleComments.childComment: the kilo is trash and so is anyone who uses it.

articleComments.name: Will
articleComments.childComment: Fall guys is alright, I think the game gets boring fast.

articleComments.name: Jimmy
articleComments.childComment: tim has no idea what he's talking about. Stuns can be useful in many situations you just have to know when to use them.

articleComments.name: jeff
articleComments.childComment: Stuns are good for doing exactly what they're supposed to. Stunning people not getting kills.

articleComments.name: Will
articleComments.childComment: Don't you use the kilo on your main class?

articleComments.name: John
articleComments.childComment: Love this game. I spend so much playing it. I can't get enough.

articleComments.name: Owen
articleComments.childComment: This game is fun if you like playing mini games with friends
